inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: SCVMM Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: SCVMM connection to configure before running any SCVMM operation

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to be performed on the SCVMM virtual machines.

inputs.name: VMList
inputs.label: Virtual Machine Names
inputs.visibleRule: Action = CreateChekPoint || Action = DeleteChekPoint || Action = NewVM || Action = Restore || Action = StartVM || Action = StopVM
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a comma separated list of the virtual machine's names. For example, FabrikamWeb, FabrikamDB, FabrikamTest.

inputs.name: VMTemplateName
inputs.label: Virtual Machine Template Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide a Virtual Machine Template Name, using this template virtual machine will be created

inputs.name: CheckPointName
inputs.label: Checkpoint Name
inputs.visibleRule: Action = Restore || Action = CreateChekPoint || Action = DeleteChekPoint

inputs.name: CheckPointDescription
inputs.label: Description For Checkpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the Description for new checkPointName

inputs.name: ScopeFilter
inputs.label: Select VMs From
inputs.visibleRule: Action = Restore || Action = CreateChekPoint || Action = DeleteChekPoint || Action = StopVM || Action = StartVM
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the filter for Virtual Machine

inputs.name: ScopeFilterForNewVM
inputs.label: Deploy the VMs to
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the filter for Virtual Machine

inputs.name: CloudFilter
inputs.label: Cloud Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Cloud name to filter the VM

inputs.name: HostFilter
inputs.label: Host Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Host name to filter the VM

inputs.name: VMPath
inputs.label: Placement path for VM
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify virtual machine path to be used during virtual machine placement. For example, path on the host machine - 'C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows\Hyper-V'

inputs.name: NewVMAdditionalArgs
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the additional arguments for command to create new virtual machine using template

inputs.name: ScriptPath
inputs.label: Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of powershell script. Should be fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory.

inputs.name: ScriptArguments
inputs.label: Script Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional parameters to pass to PowerShell. Can be either ordinal or named parameters.

inputs.name: WorkingFolder
inputs.label: Working folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory when script is run. Defaults to the folder where the script is located.

inputs.name: WaitTimeToGetOSResponse
inputs.label: Wait Time
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify wait time in seconds for the Virtual Machine to be in ready state.
inputs.visibleRule: Action = StartVM || Action = Restore || Action = NewVM

inputs.name: computerNameFromTemplate
inputs.label: Set Computer name as defined in VM template
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the checkbox is selected, computer name will be set as defined in the specified VM template. If not selected, Computer name will be same as that of the 'Virtual Machine Names'
